description_text:
I made an order yesterday. I would really appreciate if I could cancel my
Orders #SSN1782
Thanks in advance
Craig

conversations.body_text: Hi Craig Holt,  ​Would you mind sharing the reason for canceling the order? We'd like to better understand the situation so we can improve our service in the future.

Nothing on your end, I just got hit with some unforeseen and unfortunate
financial circumstances, so I need it to be canceled. I will definitely be
back to do business with you guys again in the near future, when I get my
finances ironed out. Thanks for your understanding.

On Wed, Jun 18, 2025, 9:13 PM service@simsonn.com

​  Hi, your order has been split into two packages both of which have been shipped, and the pedals have not been updated with the international logistics number. We are unable to cancel it for you, sorry.
